translations: 使概念化，构思（conceptualize 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: to bring new ideas or perspectives to bear ( conceptualizing )
sentences.translation: 带来新的想法或观点（概念化）

sentences.sentence: Some designers fall back on templates or personal work habits when conceptualizing a design.
sentences.translation: 部分设计师在思考一项设计概念时会利用模板化内容或者个人工作习惯。

sentences.sentence: The difficulty involved in conceptualizing new software applications varies from project to project.
sentences.translation: 新软件应用程序概念化的难点因项目的不同而不同。
